scripts.extract-version: cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]'
scripts.add-version:
echo "/*! example-module $(npm run extract-version --silent) — © Heydon Pickering */
$(cat example-module.min.js)" > example-module.min.js
scripts.build: npm run uglify && npm run add-version
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run build
